properties.description: Niron Magnetics, Inc. is a private manufacturing company specializing in high-performance, rare-earth-free permanent magnets for industries such as automotive, defense, and medical devices; with 88 employees (+36.4% YoY growth), $10M annual revenue, and $161.6M in total funding, last raised via debt financing on 2025-01-21. Founded in 2015 and headquartered in Minneapolis, MN, it is reshaping American manufacturing with sustainable magnet solutions.

###### Applications

# The world runs on permanent magnets

[**Industrial Motors & Generators**](https://www.nironmagnetics.com/)

### From consumer electronics to the motors powering industry, permanent magnets are the invisible force that converts electricity to motion in the devices you use every day.

### At Niron Magnetics, we produce the world’s only high performance, rare-earth-free permanent magnets. Our Iron Nitride magnet technology and world-leading magnetics expertise enhance the applications that use magnets to help revolutionize your industry.

## Industrial Motors & Generators

###### Solutions

# **The global supply chain is vulnerable. We secure** **vital industries by reshaping domestic magnet production.**

## Secure.

## Secure.

## Secure.

### Zero rare earths. Zero critical minerals. The raw materials for our magnets are globally abundant and 100% domestically sourced. This creates a permanently secure supply chain.

### Zero rare earths. Zero critical minerals. The raw materials for our magnets are globally abundant and 100% domestically sourced. This creates a permanently secure supply chain.

###### (Conceptual Design)

### Niron Magnetics is reshaping American manufacturing. We saw the problems caused by rare earth dependence and took a fundamentally different approach, reconceptualizing how magnets can be made. Our groundbreaking Iron Nitride technology was born at the University of Minnesota, then developed and manufactured right here in Minnesota.

### The result is a more secure and sustainable supply chain, and a material that unlocks innovation in magnet-using devices. With facilities clean enough to sit in the heart of cities, and our world-class team of experts, we are creating the future of magnetics.

properties.description: Renewable energy semiconductor manufacturer founded in 2021; 84 employees with 50% YoY growth; $117.8M total funding including Series A in June 2024 and a February 2025 grant; based in Denver, CO; develops inertial fusion energy technology using high-energy lasers for commercial deployment.
properties.content:
# Powering a better world with inertial fusion energy.

Xcimer is extending the proven science of inertial fusion to commercial deployment, by building the world’s highest-energy laser system to enable the most viable approach to fusion energy.

# Powering a better world with inertial fusion energy.

###### Xcimer is extending the proven science of inertial fusion to commercial deployment, by building the world’s highest-energy laser system to enable the most viable approach to fusion energy.

### [Vulcan site search begins, led by Brian Boggs](https://xcimer.energy/xcimer-hires-first-corporate-development-exec-as-inertial-fusion-company-accelerates-site-search-for-vulcan/)

Xcimer Energy October 23, 2025

Xcimer’s next-generation facility, Vulcan, will deliver the world’s highest laser energy and house the largest laser amplifiers ever built. Led by Brian Boggs, this effort will bring high-skill jobs and anchor the next wave of U.S. clean-energy innovation.

[Updates](https://xcimer.energy/updates/)

### [Fusion startup Xcimer unveils its novel laser, and Axios fired it](https://xcimer.energy/fusion-startup-xcimer-unveils-its-novel-laser-and-axios-fired-it/)

Axios June 10, 2025

### [Our first laser system is operating and already achieving records](https://xcimer.energy/our-first-laser-system-is-operating-and-already-achieving-records/)

Alexander Valys June 11, 2025

OUR PLAN

## We've developed the most viable path to put commercial fusion energy on the grid

By combining proven science with breakthrough laser technology, we're building systems that dramatically reduce cost, scale efficiently, and deliver real electricity. Our roadmap starts with LPK and will lead to the first commercial inertial fusion power plant.

[Approach](https://xcimer.energy/approach/)

- OUR COMPANY

## Building a world-class team across industries





We’re a team of over 70 engineers, scientists, technicians and others who are committed to making fusion energy a reality. We come from backgrounds including aerospace, academic research, national laboratories, semiconductor manufacturing, high-performance computing, and software.

- OUR COMPANY

## We are working to solve one of the most difficult challenges of our time.





Comprising a diverse group of visionaries, physicists, engineers and beyond, we are working to push the frontiers in laser fusion science and technology for a clean, limitless energy source.

- OUR COMPANY

## Our culture and team spirit comes from a common vision





Our team is a vibrant mix of talent, partners, and advisors from multiple industries, from mechanical engineering to software development, and from environmental science to project management. Here, we value every perspective that brings us closer to a better future.


- [MISSION\
\
A better world from fusion](https://xcimer.energy/mission/)
- [SCIENCE\
\
The physics of laser fusion](https://xcimer.energy/science/)
- [APPROACH\
\

## Together with our partners, we're developing the energy source that will power humanity for millenia to come.

company.name: Xcimer Energy Corporation
company.about:
Xcimer Energy believes that abundant energy creates a world where anything is possible. From climate change, to national security, to energy justice, fusion will give us the tools we need to address global challenges and lead to a cleaner, safer, more prosperous world for all humanity. 

Xcimer Energy is developing a system based on laser inertial confinement fusion, which is the only fusion approach that has achieved scientific breakeven. The Xcimer team will leverage this achievement and the significant progress made by the laser fusion community to advance IFE. 

Xcimer’s mission is to create a better and more equitable world through economically attractive, abundant, and carbon-free fusion energy enabled by a dramatic reduction in laser cost, enabling game-changing simplifications to the design of a laser fusion power plant. Xcimer has assembled a team of experts from U.S. national laboratories, academic institutions, and private industry to work together toward this mission. 

Abundant and inexpensive fusion power will transform how the world thinks about energy. The scientific, engineering, and manufacturing Xcimer’s plant design enables can spark a broad expansion of the U.S. industrial and workforce base, especially in high-value technologies like electrical power, optics, and precision manufacturing, and present a once-in-a-generation opportunity to ensure the benefits of this expansion flow equitably and inclusively to the entire nation.

# Driving better organizational outcomes through data unification

Bluestaq enables confident data strategies and decision-making with an ecosystem that securely ingests, stores, manages, discovers, and shares data.

### Your Single Source of Truth for Data Integration

Build a powerful global footprint of both on-premises, cloud-based, and edge systems with Bluestaq’s data ecosystem. We enable optimized operations, so you accelerate your data’s time to value and make data your greatest strategic asset.

### EnterprisePlatform

Bluestaq’s cloud-based platform can be deployed across multiple cloud availability zones and synchronized in real-time, ensuring your data is always available.

[Explore Enterprise →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/enterprise)

### HybridSolution

The Bluestaq on-premise hybrid cloud solution, available in single-node or multi-node deployments, minimizes data latency for on-premises operations, facilitating efficient data exchange between users and creators.

[Explore Hybrid Platform →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/hybrid)

### EdgePlatform

The Bluestaq Edge Platform offers data mobility to remote fields, disaster recovery zones, and tactical edges, where infrastructure is minimal and information is critical. This portable and ruggedized managed solution is optimized for austere environments or conditions with limited support. It requires only power and a network connection for operation.

[Explore Edge Platform →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/edge)

### Ecommerce Marketplace

Acquire commercial data from any global vendor in seconds through Bluestaq’s ecommerce data marketplace, catering to government, commercial, and academic consumers

[Explore Ecommerce Marketplace →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/ecommerce-marketplace)

### Storefront

The storefront aids data platform users in discovering, consuming, and subscribing to data feeds with a comprehensive data catalog, live API documentation, and interactive query-building tools.

[Explore Storefront →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/storefront)

### PEPStaqAPI Gateway

A lightweight Policy Enforcement Point/API Gateway capable of securing your web-based enterprise systems.

[Explore PEPStaq API Gateway →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/pepstaq)

### Secure Content Store

The Secure Content Store is specifically architected to securely manage and exploit various types of content, including free text documents, video, audio, and imagery. It offers a powerful suite of state-of-the-art tools that operate behind the scenes, enabling users to search, discover, filter, and correlate information within unstructured, binary, and hybrid data sets.

[Explore Secure Content Store →](https://www.bluestaq.com/solutions/scs)

### Futurizing Your Data Ecosystem Data Integration

We modernize your data ecosystem and future-proof your organization for sustainable success, enabling easier exploration, searching, and discovery of your data.

### Interested in learning more?

Across your data ecosystem, individual data curators control who has access to portions of their data, thereby eliminating the behavioral challenges that typically plague operations.
[Take control of your data →](https://www.bluestaq.com/contact)

company.name: Bluestaq
company.about: Bluestaq delivers highly secure data infrastructure that powers critical missions across defense, commercial, healthcare, and space sectors. Headquartered in Colorado Springs, with a growing presence across the globe, Bluestaq is redefining how organizations manage, share, and secure data across cloud, hybrid, and edge environments. A three-time Inc. 5000 honoree and recognized as a Best Workplace for over six years, Bluestaq is driving the future of mission-ready data on a global scale. Learn more at www.bluestaq.com.

Bluestaq LLC is a technology company that enables secure connected global operations through cutting edge enterprise software and mission analytics. B...

evaluations.criterion: Company received funding between November 22, 2024 and November 22, 2025
evaluations.reasoning: Bluestaq’s internal profile lists its last funding round as a Private Equity Round dated 2024‑12‑30, which falls between November 22, 2024 and November 22, 2025. This confirms the company received funding during the required period.
